channel.itunes:subtitle: a Cortex Prime campaign
channel.itunes:author: Andrew Ardisone, David Burk, Seth A. Roby, Samantha Smith, Morgan Stites
channel.itunes:summary: An actual play podcast of our Cortex Prime campaign using a homebrew setting
channel.description: An actual play podcast of our Cortex Prime campaign using a homebrew setting

item.title: s1e1 Pilot
item.itunes:author: Andrew Ardisone, David Burk, Seth A. Roby, Samantha Smith, Morgan Stites
item.itunes:title: Pilot
item.itunes:summary: A yote is missing, and everyone is on the hunt. Kord murdered to get it; Alyx is tracking the murderer. Victoria wants the technology; Mutt just wants a paycheck. And Josephine seems to be playing all sides.

item.title: s1e2 Train Job
item.itunes:author: Andrew Ardisone, David Burk, Seth A. Roby, Samantha Smith, Morgan Stites
item.itunes:title: Train Job
item.itunes:summary: Victoria has a contact coming in on the evening train, but she's not going to make it.

item.title: s1e3 Silence Through the Rift
item.itunes:author: Andrew Ardisone, David Burk, Seth A. Roby, Samantha Smith, Morgan Stites
item.itunes:title: Silence Through the Rift
item.itunes:summary: Monsters attacks Seattle, prompting various opportunities.

item.title: s1e4 The Cardinal
item.itunes:author: Andrew Ardisone, David Burk, Seth A. Roby, Samantha Smith, Morgan Stites
item.itunes:title: The Cardinal
item.itunes:summary: Everyone gets in trouble at the Cathedral.

item.title: s1e5 In Scientia Libertas
item.itunes:author: Andrew Ardisone, David Burk, Seth A. Roby, Samantha Smith, Morgan Stites
item.itunes:title: In Scientia Libertas
item.itunes:summary: The yote attracts more attention, from people we've seen before and some we haven't.
